content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The journey of EPAM began in 1993 with 3 developers, 1 small office in Minsk, Belarus and 1 client. Arkadiy Dobkin and Leo Lozner opened a startup and began to develop it locally. Since then, the company has grown tremendously and in 1999 the history of Testing at EPAM began. It started with a job interview between Arkadiy Dobkin and Igor Ovsyanik – the founder of Software Testing Division in Belarus. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In this video you will learn about it firsthand from people who were at the origins of the creation and development of Quality Engineering at EPAM. It was important to preserve the history one of the largest and oldest practices in the company, therefore the video is recorded in Russian with English subtitles: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=67KRGWJV\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":1836366,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ccebded-b487-43c9-b938-3b72a2c66a6b/Picture111.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5ccebded-b487-43c9-b938-3b72a2c66a6b/Picture111.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture111.png\",\"name\":\"Picture111.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5ccebded-b487-43c9-b938-3b72a2c66a6b\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":818,\"height\":404},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
